title: Email/Password Sign Up Flow
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up using a valid email and password and receives an email confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sign Up page
Enter a valid email address and a strong password
Submit the sign up form
Verify email confirmation message is shown indicating user must confirm their email
Open confirmation email and click the confirmation link
Confirm that the user account is activated and they are redirected to the sign in page

title: Google OAuth Sign In Flow
description: Verify that users can sign in successfully using Google OAuth authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the Sign In page
Click the 'Sign in with Google' button
Complete the Google OAuth authentication flow
Verify successful sign in and redirect to the user dashboard

title: Password Reset Flow
description: Verify that users can successfully reset their password via email link.

steps.description: Navigate to the Reset Password page
Enter registered email address and submit reset request
Verify that password reset email is sent
Open the password reset email and click the reset link
Enter and confirm a new valid password
Verify password reset success confirmation and ability to sign in with new password

title: Profile Completion Mandatory Flow
description: Verify that new users are required to complete profile with blood group and location before accessing main features.

steps.description: Sign in as a newly registered user without a completed profile
Verify redirect to Complete Profile page
Attempt to navigate to dashboard or other app features
Verify user cannot access these features before profile completion
Fill in required fields: blood group, location, and other mandatory info
Submit the profile completion form
Verify successful profile completion and access to full app features

title: Create New Blood Request
description: Verify that authenticated users can create new blood requests with required fields and valid data.

steps.description: Sign in and navigate to the Create Blood Request page
Fill in blood request form with urgency, blood type, hospital location, and contact info
Submit the blood request
Verify that the new request appears in the user's request list and on the urgent requests homepage section

title: Blood Request CRUD Operations and Validation
description: Verify create, read, update, delete operations for blood requests including input validation and error handling.

steps.description: Create a new blood request with valid data
Verify successful creation and correct display
Edit the existing blood request to change urgency and contact info
Verify the updates are saved and displayed correctly
Attempt to create or update requests with invalid inputs (e.g. missing required fields, invalid locations)
Verify appropriate validation error messages are shown and no invalid data is saved
Delete a blood request
Verify the request is removed from the list and database

title: Blood Request Filtering, Search and Pagination
description: Verify blood requests can be filtered by urgency, blood type, location, and paginated correctly with search functionality.

steps.description: Navigate to the blood request listing page
Apply filters for urgency level and blood group
Verify that the requests displayed match filter criteria
Use search box with partial and full keywords to find requests by hospital or contact
Verify that search results are relevant and accurate
Navigate through pages using pagination controls
Verify correct requests are shown per page and page count is accurate

title: Donor Registration and Availability Toggle
description: Verify users can register as donors including input of blood group and location, and toggle availability status reliably.

steps.description: Authenticate user and navigate to Donor Registration form
Input required donor info: blood group, location, contact details
Submit donor registration
Verify user appears in donor list with correct details and default availability status
Toggle donor availability status on
Verify donor availability updates immediately in UI and real-time donor searches
Toggle donor availability status off
Verify donor is removed from availability lists in real-time

title: Donor Search Functionality with Filters and Pagination
description: Verify users can search for donors by blood group, availability, and location with functioning pagination over results.

steps.description: Navigate to Find Donors page
Apply blood group and location filters
Verify donor list updates accurately to display matching donors
Use pagination controls to navigate through multiple pages of donors
Verify consistency and correctness of donor list per page

title: Real-Time Donor Status Updates
description: Verify that donor availability status changes are propagated instantly to subscribed users via real-time updates.

steps.description: Subscribe to donor status updates on a client
From a different client, change donor availability status
Verify real-time status indicator updates immediately on subscribed clients
Simulate network interruption and recovery during updates
Verify synchronization of donor statuses resumes correctly without data loss

title: Homepage Component Rendering and Content Accuracy
description: Verify all homepage sections render correctly and display current data such as urgent requests and donation impact statistics.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage
Verify hero section is visible with correct text and images
Verify trusted companies logos are displayed
Verify urgent blood requests are shown and up to date
Verify donation impact statistics reflect accurate values
Verify educational content and testimonials sections render without errors

title: Navigation and Responsive Layout with Error Boundary Handling
description: Verify header and footer links work correctly, theme toggling functions, layout is responsive, and errors are caught gracefully shown in UI.

steps.description: Verify all header navigation links route to correct pages
Toggle UI theme between light and dark modes
Verify theme changes persist and UI updates accordingly
Resize the browser window to different viewports (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Verify navigation and layout adapt properly without content clipping or overlap
Trigger a component error manually within a wrapped subtree
Verify error boundary displays user-friendly error message and does not crash the app

title: Database Security and Supabase RLS Enforcement
description: Verify that database Row-Level Security policies enforce user data isolation and prevent unauthorized access.

steps.description: Sign in as User A and attempt to read, update, and delete blood requests and profiles owned by User B
Verify access is denied and no data belonging to User B can be modified or fetched
Sign in as User B and perform legal operations on own data
Verify allowed operations complete successfully with proper data modifications

title: Additional Pages Accessibility and Content Verification
description: Verify About, Contact, and 404 Not Found pages are accessible, contain correct content, and handle invalid routes gracefully.

steps.description: Navigate to About page
Verify About page content matches specification and renders without errors
Navigate to Contact page
Verify Contact page includes necessary contact info and form or links as designed
Navigate to a random invalid URL not mapped in routing
Verify 404 Not Found page is displayed with appropriate messaging and navigation options

title: Supabase Edge Function Admin and User Deletion Actions
description: Verify Supabase edge functions for admin actions and user deletion operate securely and trigger expected backend changes.

steps.description: Invoke admin-action edge function with valid admin credentials to perform an administrative task
Verify the admin action completes successfully with correct backend effects
Invoke user deletion edge function with authenticated user token to delete user's account
Verify user data is removed from database and session is invalidated
Attempt edge function access without proper authentication
Verify access is denied and no operation is performed
